## NodeExtensionSpec interface

The schema spec definition for a node extension

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NodeExtensionSpec extends Pick<NodeSpec, 'content' | 'marks' | 'group' | 'inline' | 'atom' | 'attrs' | 'selectable' | 'draggable' | 'code' | 'defining' | 'isolating' | 'parseDOM' | 'toDebugString'> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [toDOM](./core-types.nodeextensionspec.todom.md) | <code>(node: ProsemirrorNode) =&gt; DOMOutputSpec</code> | Defines the default way a node of this type should be serialized to DOM/HTML (as used by \[<code>DOMSerializer.fromSchema</code>\](\#model.DOMSerializer^fromSchema)).<!-- -->Should return a [DOMOutputSpec](./core-types.domoutputspec.md) that describes a DOM node, with an optional number zero (“hole”) in it to indicate where the node's content should be inserted. |
